table.Action_x0020_Data: BuffCaster;<?xml version="1.0"?> <view width="88" height="49" title="BuffCaster"> <control type="layout"> <control type="button" name="Pause" left="6" top="6" width="75" height="15" text="Pause" setstate="Pause" actionexpr="setvar[Pause, iif[getvar[Pause]==1, setvar[Pause, 0], setvar[Pause, 1]]]" /> <control type="button" name="Reset" left="6" top="27" width="75" height="15" text="Reset" setstate="Reset" actionexpr="false" /> </control> </view>
setvar[SpamOne, \/s I\'m a buffbot running Buffcaster\!]
setvar[SpamTwo, \/s Ask me for a \'brill\' if you need one\.]
setvar[SpamThree, \/s I can summon portals too\, tell me \'whereto\' to find out where they go\!]
setvar[SpamFour, \/s You can tell me \'stats\' if you\'re bored\.]
setvar[SpamFive, \/s Tell me \'help\' for a list of commands\.]

table.Action_x0020_Data: ChatWithExpression{\/s Thank you for the +getvar[capturegroup_item]+\, +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\!}SetState{*** Main Loop ***}

ExpressionAct{setvar[lowcomps, 1]}ChatCommand{/s I am running dangerously low on Prismatic Tapers, please consider donating some so I may continue buffing.}ExpressionAct{setvar[comptimer, stopwatchcreate[]]}ExpressionAct{stopwatchstart[getvar[comptimer]]}

ExpressionAct{setvar[lowcomps, 1]}ChatCommand{/s I am running dangerously low on Silver Scarabs, please consider donating some so I may continue summoning portals.}ExpressionAct{setvar[comptimer, stopwatchcreate[]]}ExpressionAct{stopwatchstart[getvar[comptimer]]}

table.Action_x0020_Data: ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, Buff Commands\: war\, void\, missile\, heavy\, light\, finesse\, two\, trade\, tink\, xp\, buffs\, strength\, lore\, mule\, prots\, baneshield\, brill\, weapon\, wand\.}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, Bot Commands\: primary\, secondary\, mm\, tn\, whereto\, stats\, loc\, heal\, stam\, mana\, and cancel\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I am currently tied to +getvar[Primary Tie]+\ \[primary\]\, and +getvar[Secondary Tie]+\ \[secondary]\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I am located in +getvar[Location]+\, at +coordinatetostring[getplayercoordinates[]]+\.}ReturnFromCall{0}

ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, Since my last restart\, I have cast +cstr[getvar[castcounter]]+\ spells in +cstr[round[getvar[timercountertwo]/60]]+\ minutes from +cstr[getvar[requestcounter]]+\ requests\, and fizzled +cstr[getvar[fizzle]]+\ times\.}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, That\'s an average of +cstr[round[getvar[castcounter]/getvar[requestcounter]]]+\ spells per request\, and +cstr[round[getvar[timercountertwo]/getvar[castcounter]]]+\ seconds per spell\, with a fizzle rate of +cstrf[getvar[fizzle]/getvar[castcounter], F]+\%\.}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I have opened +cstr[getvar[TN Counter]]+\ portals to Town Network\, +cstr[getvar[MM Counter]]+\ portals to the master mage\, recharge vitals other +cstr[getvar[Vital Counter]]+\ times\, and cast Brilliance +cstr[getvar[Brill Counter]]+\ times\.}ReturnFromCall{0}

ChatCommand{/s I am now opening up a portal to the Master Mage.}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, Opening up Master Mage portal now\!}ExpressionAct{setvar[mmtimer, stopwatchcreate[]]}ExpressionAct{stopwatchstart[getvar[mmtimer]]}SetState{Cast-MasterMage}

ChatCommand{/s I am opening up a portal to the Town Network now.}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, Your request for Town Network has been granted\, portal opening now\.}ExpressionAct{setvar[mmtimer, stopwatchcreate[]]}ExpressionAct{stopwatchstart[getvar[mmtimer]]}SetState{Cast-TownNetwork}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, but I seem to have run out of Town Network Portal Gems\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, but I seem to have run out of +getvar[MasterMageGem]+s\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, but I have opened a portal within the last \6\0 seconds\, please request again shortly\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, but brill requests are disabled at this time\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, but master mage requests are disabled at this time\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, the portal bot is disabled at this time\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, Town Network Portal Gems are disabled at this time\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
ChatWithExpression{\/t +getvar[capturegroup_name]+\, I\'m sorry\, but recharging vitals has been disabled on this bot\.}ReturnFromCall{0}
